title: A fire escape or external stair shall be provided as provided in Regulation No
clause_text: A fire escape or external stair shall be provided as provided in Regulation No.9.28.7. External stairs, when provided, shall comply the following : External stairs shall always be kept in sound operable conditions. All external stairs shall be directly connected to the ground. Entrance to the external stairs shall be separate and remote from the internal staircase.
